text: Pumi'n inaminriang ule naingai, nangni sik bit-ah keini'n inchatlekleiya Pathian minpaaksik rahoi eii. Ajarchu Pathian'n nangni kha sanminringna sik-ah Ratha ranak-ah khat-um akadik kha ningngamna jarra ama sik-ah inthiang mi ngai namin-enasik mansakhet-ah2:13. mansakhet; manuscript lekkhat achu inphutna makheiya tia injia. inakadang kha ning-ejei.
